sentences.en: ...the ultimate triumph of communism in the world.
sentences.cn: …共产主义在全世界的最终胜利。

sentences.en: The Gang of Four's absurd theory of socialism and communism led only to poverty and stagnation.
sentences.cn: “四人帮”荒谬的理论导致中国处于贫困、停滞的状态.

sentences.en: the ultimate triumph of communism in the world
sentences.cn: 共产主义在全世界的最终胜利

words.tran_cn: 共产主义的；共产主义者的

trans.tran_en: a political system in which the government controls the production of all food and goods, and there is no privately owned property
